basic.description: A seminar or workshop in selected areas of the curriculum in DRAM and FILM. Not offered every year. See Departments for details.
basic.subject: STSC
basic.title: Special Topics in Stage and Screen

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    (12.0 units from DRAM201; DRAM202; DRAM205; DRAM237; DRAM238; DRAM251) or (12.0 units from FILM206; FILM216; FILM226; FILM236; FILM250) or permission of the Depts of Drama and Film and Media.
